insert into report_warehouse_biz_import(import_date, warehouse_code, biz_type, import_type, customer_id, create_time, del_flag) SELECT importDate, warehouseCode, biz_type, importType, customerId, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag} FROM (SELECT warehouse_code as warehouseCode, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') as importDate, customerid as customerId, 'THEORY' as importType, 'PALLET' as biz_type FROM biz_product_storage WHERE del_flag = '0' AND create_time >= #{startTime} AND create_time < #{endTime} GROUP BY warehouse_code,DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m'), customerid
UNION ALL
SELECT warehouse_code as warehouseCode, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') as importDate, customerid as customerId, 'ACTUAL' as importType, 'PALLET' as biz_type FROM biz_product_pallet_storage WHERE del_flag = '0' AND create_time >= #{startTime} AND create_time < #{endTime} GROUP BY warehouse_code,DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m'),customerid) a
on DUPLICATE KEY update create_time=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP};

insert into report_warehouse_biz_import(import_date, warehouse_code, biz_type, import_type, customer_id, create_time, del_flag) SELECT importDate, warehouseCode, biz_type, importType, customerId, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM (SELECT warehouse_code as warehouseCode, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') as importDate, customerid as customerId, 'THEORY' as importType, 'MATERIAL' as biz_type FROM biz_outstock_master WHERE del_flag = '0' AND create_time >= #{startTime} AND create_time < #{endTime} AND b2b_flag = '0' GROUP BY warehouse_code, DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m'), customerid
UNION ALL
SELECT bop.warehouse_code as warehouseCode, DATE_FORMAT(bop.create_time, '%Y-%m') as importDate, bop.customer_id as customerId, 'ACTUAL' as importType, 'MATERIAL' as biz_type FROM biz_outstock_packmaterial bop LEFT JOIN biz_outstock_master bom ON bop.waybill_no = bom.waybill_no WHERE bop.del_flag = '0' AND bop.create_time >= #{startTime} AND bop.create_time < #{endTime} AND bom.b2b_flag = '0' GROUP BY bop.warehouse_code, DATE_FORMAT(bop.create_time, '%Y-%m'), bop.customer_id) a
on DUPLICATE KEY update create_time=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP};
